Original: That request is from the clinic. They
are working on a new medicine, but
need some [Color:6][Item:1250][Color:0] to finish it.
[Page]
The bark can be found at the [Color:5]Toxic
Cave[Color:0], but there is something unusual
about it that you should know.
[Page]
The venom spewed by a poison dragon
forms some kind of substance, and that
is what creates the [Item:1250].
[Page]
A poison dragon... it sounds utterly
terrifying. Be careful as you retrieve
the material.
Translation: That request is from the clinic. They
are working on a new medicine, but
need some [Color:6][Item:1250][Color:0] to finish it.
[Page]
The bark can be found at the [Color:5]Toxic
Cave[Color:0], but there is something unusual
about it that you should know.
[Page]
The venom spewed by a poison dragon
forms some kind of substance, and that
is what creates the [Item:1250].
[Page]
A poison dragon... it sounds utterly
terrifying. Be careful as you retrieve
the material.

Original: Just after you accept the request, you
recall already having obtained some
[Color:6][Number:0][Color:0].
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request
quickly, you may report in now and
deliver the [Number:0].
Translation: Just after you accept the request, you
recall already having obtained some
[Color:6][Number:0][Color:0].
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request
quickly, you may report in now and
deliver the [Number:0].

Original: Welcome back. So this is the [Item:1250]
formed from the venom? It looks to my
untrained eye like normal tree bark.
[Page]
Maybe this tree takes advantage of
the beast's poison, since the other
plants there wither and die.
[Page]
That way, it can have the nutrients
in the soil all to itself. It is
quite coldhearted, for a tree.
[Page]
Here, this is your reward. It helps
to ward off poison. Should I have
given you this before you left...?
Translation: Welcome back. So this is the [Item:1250]
formed from the venom? It looks to my
untrained eye like normal tree bark.
[Page]
Maybe this tree takes advantage of
the beast's poison, since the other
plants there wither and die.
[Page]
That way, it can have the nutrients
in the soil all to itself. It is
quite coldhearted, for a tree.
[Page]
Here, this is your reward. It helps
to ward off poison. Should I have
given you this before you left...?

Original: Having accepted a request to deliver
medicinal herbs, you arrive at the
poison-soaked destination.
[Page]
This must be the tree bark you were
asked to retrieve. You must cut off
a piece to fulfill the request.
Translation: Having accepted a request to deliver
medicinal herbs, you arrive at the
poison-soaked destination.
[Page]
This must be the tree bark you were
asked to retrieve. You must cut off
a piece to fulfill the request.

Original: You carefully cut off a piece of bark
without touching the poison and place
it in your belongings.
[Page]
With this, the request is complete!
All that remains is to take the bark
back to the bar when you have time.
Translation: You carefully cut off a piece of bark
without touching the poison and place
it in your belongings.
[Page]
With this, the request is complete!
All that remains is to take the bark
back to the bar when you have time.

Original: You recall the quest you accepted to
deliver the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0]...
[Page]
It is currently with your things.
You make a mental note not to sell it
before you have reported to the bar.
Translation: You recall the quest you accepted to
deliver the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0]...
[Page]
It is currently with your things.
You make a mental note not to sell it
before you have reported to the bar.

Original: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Toxic Cave[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Toxic Cave[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
